WildFly 38 Model Reference

  1. home
  2. subsystem=infinispan
  3. cache-container
  4. cache

The configuration of the infinispan subsystem.

Runtime only resource This resource is runtime only and doesn't have any persistent configuration.

Children (1)

  • component A configuration component of a cache.
    • locking The locking configuration of the cache.
    • partition-handling The partition handling configuration for distributed and replicated caches.
    • persistence The configuration of the infinispan subsystem.
    • transaction The cache transaction configuration.

Attributes (22)

  • activations The number of cache node activations (bringing a node into memory from a cache store).
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • average-read-time Average time (in ms) for cache reads. Includes hits and misses.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Unit MILLISECONDS
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • average-remove-time Average time (in ms) for cache removes.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Unit MILLISECONDS
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • average-replication-time The average time taken to replicate data around the cluster.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Unit MILLISECONDS
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • average-write-time Average time (in ms) for cache writes.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Unit MILLISECONDS
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • evictions The number of cache eviction operations.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • hit-ratio The hit/miss ratio for the cache (hits/hits+misses).
    • Attribute Value
    Type DOUBLE
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • hits The number of cache attribute hits.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • invalidations The number of cache invalidations.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • misses The number of cache attribute misses.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • number-of-entries The number of entries in the cache including passivated entries.
    • Attribute Value
    Type INT
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • number-of-entries-in-memory The number of entries in the cache excluding passivated entries.
    • Attribute Value
    Type INT
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • passivations The number of cache node passivations (passivating a node from memory to a cache store).
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • read-write-ratio The read/write ratio of the cache ((hits+misses)/stores).
    • Attribute Value
    Type DOUBLE
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • remove-hits The number of cache attribute remove hits.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • remove-misses The number of cache attribute remove misses.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • replication-count The number of times data was replicated around the cluster.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • replication-failures The number of data replication failures.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • success-ratio The data replication success ratio (successes/successes+failures).
    • Attribute Value
    Type DOUBLE
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • time-since-reset Time (in secs) since cache statistics were reset.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Unit SECONDS
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • time-since-start Time (in secs) since cache was started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Unit SECONDS
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • writes The number of cache attribute put operations.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default

Operations (1)

  • reset-statistics Reset the statistics for this cache.
